msgs.Content:
We had 5 minutes to opening and the only men here were Nagisa and Rei. They are reliable of nothing else. 

"Rei-kun, Nagi-kun? Do you know where everyone is? Normally we can open early."
"Apparently, there was a party and date night last night. We may have to close early, Momo-dono."
"Eh~? Party Date? Since when?" Nagisa asked.
"Since Rin-chan-san and Sousuke senpai found dates or something. I was in bed by 10 so I have no recollection of anything after that."
"Way to stay healthy, Rei-kun."

Nagisa pouted lightly. Was there a party that he wasn't aware of? More importantly...He didn't even knew that Rei drinks.

"Eh? Rei-chan I didn't know that you drink.."
"Drinking? What do you mean Nagisa-kun?"
"Didn't you went to the party?" Nagisa asked.
"No. Parties last until 2am or later. I can't come to work without a full night's rest. It's not beautiful."
"Oh my. I guess no one knows I only got 5 hours of sleep!"
"Eh?! How did you only mange to get 5 hours of sleep Momo-chan?"

I shrug and think about my night. 
"Uh, I think I just watch too much tv..."
"That's terrible for you, Momo-dono."
"You know what else is terrible? My staff missing!"

Nagisa flinches from Momo's rage. She can be pretty scary when no one is here on time..

"W-Well...everyone should be here soon!"
"Ugh...just unlock the doors and we'll get started. Nagi-kun you'll have to take 2 guests. Rei-kun you may have to take 2 or 3."
"Hai. I'll get the doors."
"Okay~!" Nagisa happily cheered.

Rin overslept. His alarms were not set so they did not go off. He rolled around and looked at the time. It was 2 minutes before opening!

"NO! Why me...!"

He ran to the shower hoping Sousuke was not

With a massive sigh, a figure known to be Sousuke, has finally arrived to work. He approached from the back of the building's door; hoping no one has noticed his tardiness.

With a quick change of clothes and double check up on his appearance, he was able to finally pull himself together and confidently face his wrath. However, Sousuke didn't mind...he was going to impress his boss today in hopes to finally see him more than just an "employer"

Too bad he had to leave Rin behind..but he did left a small note...in hopes for him to get some sort of message. Without another hesitation, the man walked inside the building and went to find his boss.

I sat in my office a little angry at my late employees. Makoto has gone AWOL Sousuke and Rin are late...it makes the start of the day a little rough. I turned around and saw a certain teal eyes beauty. I flagged him down to come into my office.

"Sousuke, you're late. Why is that?"

Sousuke noticed his bosses rage. He hasn't seen her this this upset in a while.

The man rubbed the back of his neck while trying to find the words to say.

"Sorry...I overslept..." He commented.

"Uh huh. Don't let happen again."

I opened the door for him.

"You're free to go."

Sousuke crossed his arms and let his lips curve into a small smirk.

"Kicking me out so soon? Someone's harsh to me today.." He teased towards the boss.

Sousuke always loved to tease Momo no matter what time of day or what situations that they both are in. He didn't really care if he would get yelled at, he just loves seeing her reactions.
"Sousuke, if you like getting a paycheck from me you will leave. I'm in no mood for your trasing
I down in my chair and hoped he would leave

Sousuke looked at the girl for a moment and sighed. He quietly left the room in hopes to see the manager in a better mood.

Truth to be told, seeing the boss in a bad mood breaks his heart. He didn't like how the manager was always so uptight and never lose. Sousuke only hopped that one day, he'll be able to see a whole new side of her.
Rin was right behind Sousuke and with impressive. He wondered if he could sneak in through the back. Too bad the boss was coming out as he was coming in.
"I guess you overslept too...."
...hai. I apologize but my alarms never went off. It won't happen again.
"Fine...! Just don't let it happen again"
"Yes, it won't!"
"just get to work."

Sousuke noticed how Rin was looking back at the manager. The whale-shark couldn't help but to snicker at his best friend.

He looked at the sleepy man and greeted him.

"Morning sleeping beauty."

"Shut up..." 
 Rin put his uniform and got to work. The day was not busy at all. He only entertained 3 guests! There was no reason for the manager to be angry. 
 "Sousuke, any luck on your date or asking?"

The man snickered and began to work. Overall, his day wasn't too terrible, he had about 4-5 guest that sat besides him. As he was finishing his last guest, he gave a sweet kiss onto the visitor's hand while looking up to them with a gentle smile.

"I look forward to seeing you're beautiful face again my Princess..." He spoke in a gentle manner.

After his guest left, the whale-sharked sighed to himself. His job was done for the day. He looked back at his best friend and shook his head.

"Huh? You mean with the manager?"

The whale-shark man began to awkwardly rub the back of his neck and shook his head.

"She's been in a pretty uptight mood...I have to talk to her when she's a bit more calm."

Sousuke looked back at Rin and smirked lightly.

"What about you? I heard you mumble a certain person's name last night in your sleep.." Sousuke mentions to Rin.

Rin was only half into his job now. Maybe it was time to look for something else but how could he when he could make his own hours? He looked up at Sousuke and turned his head. He could feel his blush when he thought about you. 
 "Shut up. I have a girlfriend now, ok. She's...incredible. You should buy the boss a drink or something. Try being smooth for once in your life."

"Thank you for all your hard work boys! Go have fun. We're not opening tomorrow...a pipe burst in the ladies room.... I'll be here if you want to stop by for lunch." 
 I sighed and went back to my office. I counted on my boys to lock up behind them.

Sousuke sighed and began to rub the back of his neck again. He really hasn't though about being smooth to her considering how she and him always were playful. Maybe he'll consider Rin's advice for once.

"I guess it doesn't hurt to try.." He spoke.

He turned over and notice how Momo made an announcement. Lunch she says? Maybe spending lunch with her tomorrow would be a start....
"Eh? How did the pipe burst into the room?" Nagisa asked.

"I have no idea, Sweety. Have a nice day off. I'll call you all when everything is ready."
I looked over to the door and sighed.

"Thank you, boss. I really appreciate it." 

He went back to the locker room and grabbed his backpack. He looked over to Sousuke and smirked.

"It works. Just talk to her."

Sousuke wasn't sure how to ask the girl, especially when she mst be in a bad mood.

"I'll...ask her tomorrow..."

"Wuss. Afraid you'll be rejected? What kind of man are you?" 
 Rin finished dressing and went to his friend. 
 "She won't be available forever."

Souske knew that Rin had a point...he /had/ to ask her and /needs/ to approach to her at one point without ever bringing himself into a flirty state..

Once he was done changing into his clothes in the locker room, he quickly looked back at his best friend and sighed.

"Your right...might as well ask her now."

Sousuke wasn't always afraid to approach something when he needed anything...However, the only thing thats stopping him is his sense of directions...

"Um...think you can come with me?" He asked Rin

Rin rolled his eyes and walked him to the boss' office.

"Get in there already!"

Sousuke was able to follow Rin towards the girl's office. He sighed deeply and looked at his best friend.

"I will..thanks Rin" He smiled down onto his best friend and knocked onto the office, hoping that his boss was still in her office.

I finished the last of my paperwork and stretched. I heard the knock and went to answer it. I looked up at Sousuke and gave him a gentle smile.

"Hi. What's going on?"

Sousuke noticed the girl before her. He knew what he had to do. He was finally able to get her attention but he wouldn't know how to calm his own heart down.

With a deep breath, he looked down at the girl with his teal eyes staring down into hers.

"Can we talk?"

"Oh sure. Take a seat. What can I help you with? Was it an angry customer? Did you get propositioned?" 

I wondered what could have Sousuke flustered. Maybe he had a bad day

Sousuke began to rub the back of his neck shyly while trying to come up with the words to not mess up.

"Listen...when...you mentioned about you being here for lunch tomorrow...I was just wondering if you would...want to have lunch with me instead. The lunch can be my treat."

I smiled up at him. He was too adorable right now. 
 "Sousuke I'm going to be here anyway. I'll have the kitchen open for you guys. You can cook food I mean. Are you actually asking me out on a lunch date?"

Sousuke nodded.

"Since the cafe is closed...I though we can just have some lunch together, and I'm serious about this"

"I'm very flattered. Let me think about it. I have a lot to do tomorrow."

((I'm alright. I made dinner for my family))

Sousuke smiled gentle towards the girl. Without even thinking, he gently grabbed onto the girl's hand and kissed on top of the hand while letting his teal eyes stare onto his manager's eyes.

"Take all the time you need, there's no rush." He spoke in a gentle manner

"We'll reconvene Saturday after we close. We don't open on Sundays so we can figure something out then."
I looked up at him with a smile.

Sousuke let go of the girl's hand and smiled down on her.

"Sounds like a good plan. I look forward until then"

"Ok. Then come back here Saturday night after we close." I looked over to him and opened the door. 
 "Are you going home now? I think Rin already left."

The man raised his brow when his boss mentioned the last part. Did Rin really left him all alone again? He should know by now that Sousuke has a hard time trying to find his way home.

Sousuke sighed sadly. "Again? Well looks like I have to get doing then."

"Use your GPS Sousuke. I don't want to find you at my dinner table again."

I chuckled at the memory. Sousuke being lost and finding me eating alone was funny
"But you have to admit that you enjoyed my compnay~" He teased.
"I did but it was a late dinner. We both had to work in the morning. I'll talk to you later, ok?"

Sousuke chuckled and look down at the girl while grabbing onto his phone.

"Yeah"
"Call Rin if you get too lost. You might want to get him before he makes it to his girlfriend's."

Rin called you and hoped you would answer. Even if he could not stay long he wanted to be near you.

"Come on, Babe...pick up."

"You know...I think I'll try the GPS instead...but thanks.." Sousuke complemented.

Once he did, he began to track his own apartment and walked home.

A figure was just done singing a slow song in a nearby resturant. Claps were heard from all around the house as each of the audiences began to dine their own dinner. The figure began to pack her stuff and walk away from the restaurant. The figure was known to be Ina.

No one, not even Rin, knew about where Ina worked or what she was doing part-time. She was just casually asked to sing for restaurants and cafes to smooth the atmosphere for their guest. Ina enjoyed her job and loved it, as a child, she would always sing to her hearts content back at high school for choir class.

Her memories came to a halt when her cellphone began to ring. She looked at the caller ID and noticed how the caller was Rin. She smiled and picked up the phone.

"Hello?"

He smiled on the other end once he heard your voice.

"Hey. Do you want to have a late dinner with me? I'm at your apartment building so come on down."

Ina's eyes start to widen. She wasn't in her apartment at all, she was just done with her work not to mention how she carries her equipment with her.

"Well....we can but I'm not home right now. In fact, I was actually just on my way back home...from a friend's house. Think you can meet me at the restaurant instead?" Ina asked.

Rin frowned and looked up at your apartment building.

"Oh ok. Where do you want to meet?"

Ina smiled.

"Any restaurant is fine."
"Ok. Where are you? I can pick you up"

Ina froze. She sighed and tried to convince Rin.

"You don't have to! I'll just met you there! I'll be quick so don't worry, my friend brought stuff and I need to stop by at my place anyways."
"Then...I'll wait for you here. I don't want anything to happen to you."
"Rin trust me, I'll be fine~ You just wait and see" Ina commented with a confidence tone.
"Fine. If you're not in the diner around the corner from your apartment in 20 minutes I'm coming back for you."

Ina smiled at Rin's comment.

"You got it, I'll be there so don't worry about it!"

"Ok. I can't wait to see you."

Rin started towards the diner hoping you would be there soon

Ina smiled and hanged up her phone. She put her cellphone back and began to run towards her apartment. Once Ina arrived at her apartment she sighed deeply and entered the apartment complex area, she went up the elevator and ran towards her room.

Ina opened the door towards her apartment and quickly gets ready for her "late" dinner date.
Rin sat in a booth waiting for you. He fidgeted nervously. He knew you could take care of yourself but he wanted you to stay safe so late at night.

After a few mintues, Ina was finally able to hide her equipment and got herself out of the apartment, she quickly tries to make her way towards the diner, hoping Rin was still there. Fortunately, he was.

Ina smiled and calmly began to enter the diner, hoping to Rin to see her in the distances.

Rin brightened up when you came closer. He stood up to hug you.

"I thought you got lost like Sousuke."

Ina giggled and hugged Rin in returned; giving him a quick kiss on the lips before smirking.

"Well I know my way through visual so memorizing my surroundings isn't that hard~" She commented.

Rin was happy to kiss you back. Late night PDA was always fun.

"Good. So how was your day?"

"Today was fun, I went to resrtuants with a friend I haven't seen in a while and then we both just went to walk around a bit." She "explains"

Normally she would be honest to Rin, but she didn't want him to know about her job. It would be embarrassing.

"That's nice. Did you guys eat anything weird?"

Rin laced his fingers with yours while he spoke to you

Ina smiled and intertwined her fingers with Rin. She felt her heartbeat become rapid every time he would be with her. She loved seeing him, even if seeing him was only for a short time.

"No, we didn't~ but even if we did, then I wouldn't be here." She giggled softly.

Ina began to walk towards the table that Rin sat on when she waited for her. She gently sat on the booth and smiled at him.

"How was work for you?"
"Umm, uneventful. I didn't get many guests. I made some pretty good tips so this on me."

Ina frowned. Was Rin going to pay again?! Not on her watch.

"That's nice but you know Rin, I do have my own money here." Ina mentions

Rin grinned her and kissed her hand

"I can't treat my girlfriend to dinner??"

Ina giggled as Rin took her hand to kiss it gently.

"You can, but I'll just feel bad that you've paid for me"
"I kinda am your boyfriend. I like doing things for you."

Ina couldn't help but to blush lightly. He was just so sweet to her."

"I-I guess." she shyly spoke

"Stop being so cute...get whatever you want."

Rin's cheeks were a little blushed

Ina couldn't stop blushing, Rin just kept being cute himself.

"F-Fine" she said as she slowly grabbed the menu from the side of the table.

She began to example the menu and smiled about her choice.

Rin looked over and knew what he wanted. 

"What are you getting?"
"Well there's this wrap I want with fries which doesn't sound so bad right now! What about you?" She asked
"Maybe a burger and fries or I'll copy you."

Ina glared.

"Heeeeyyyy why my idea~?" She asked while giggling.
"It sounds good and two other people are eating it so it must be ok."
"Well...I guess." Ina said while blushing lightly and putting the menu down.

Rin moved over and kissed your cheek 
 "Wraps it is!"

Ina couldn't help but to keep on giggling. Rin was just being too adorable for her and she couldn't be anymore happier to be with the man she loved.

"Alright then!"
Rin wolfed down his food. He normally was very polite but he was more hungry than he thought

Ina saw Rin eating his food and couldn't help but to giggle again. He could have eaten without her if he was /that/ hungry.

Ina began to eat her fries and her wrap peacefully.
Rin looked up and blushed. He slowed down and looked away. "I was hungry..."

Ina giggled.

"That's okay! I'm fine with that...it's cute.." Ina spoke softly.

Run grumbled and kept his blush on his face 
 "Am not cute..."

Ina smiled and grabs a nearby napkin to wipe off the crumbs on his face.

"You are~ stop lying."
Rin stole one of your fries and kissed your lips with the remaining crumbs on his face. "I think you're cuter now, baby."

Before Ina was about to protest, her lips were caught with Rin's. When the man pulled away, she began to blush massively from the sudden contact.

"H-HEY!" She stuttered.

Rin smirked and kissed you again 
 "You're doing it again."

Ina couldn't stop blushing. Rin kept making her blush and his getting the best of her.

"S-Shut up!" She mumbled.

Eventually, Ina was done eating her food. The girl sighed and put her food away.

"Well all we need to do now is just pay, what should we do after?"

Rin stood and paid the bill. I laced his fingers with yours and kissed your hand. 
"I have to get swimming tomorrow...I'm...leaving the cafe."

Ina smiled when Rin kissed her hand.

However, her smiled turned into a frown when he mentioned about quitting the cafe.

"Huh? Why? Is swimming taking too much time from your job? How will you be able to support yourself? The cafe is literally has the biggest minimum wadge all around the town!" She said.

Rin looked at you wide eyed. Why would you be so upset? He kissed your hand again 
 "Babe, I thought you were uncomfortable with me being in a host club?"

Ina sighed. She didn't. But if going to the cafe helps him with supporting himself then theres nothing she can do. Ina never liked when people sacrifices stuff for her to be pleased. She wanted Rin to contiune. Also who knows? She could sing into the cafe one day...it was her dream cafe after all.

"I..am but...that something you enjoy...and I don't want you to throw something away just for me..." Ina spoke sadly.

Rin stopped by the fountain. He brought you close and kissed your lips. 
"I'm so lucky..."

Ina was walking side by side with her beloved. She felt so happy and alive when she's next to Rin. She couldn't be more blessed to have the one she loved right next to her.

"I could say the same thing..." She gently kissed Rin' lips back passionately

Rin pulled you closer to him and placed his forehead on yours. He pecked it then looked into your gorgeous eyes. 
"Ok so I won't quit. Do you want to come swimming with me tomorrow?"

Ina froze for a moment, only to blush lightly. Swimming? Tomorrow? Would she have to see Rin shirtless? The though of him becoming shirtless was enough to make her cheeks become hot. However, she doesn't mind going to swim with her.

"S-Sure! I wouldn't mind!" She said.

Nitori began to stroll around the park. His house was flooded and he had to evacuate out of the apartment. He didn't had much to go but to Momotaru's house. However, knowing him, he would just end up snoring and whining about how he had no chances with Gou again. He was pretty much annoyed.

"I guess theres nothing I can do about my house...hopefully it's going to be for a few days--"

His words came to a halt when he noticed a certain figure by the fountain, however, that figure wasn't alone. The poor duck hid nearby a tree to take a closer look at the two figures.

It didn't took Nitori long to noticed how one of the figures was Rin, but who was the other girl he was with?! Why was she so close to him? Nitori hoped that the person wasn't what he though she would be...

Rin kissed your lips one more time.
"I'm glad you're coming with me. Usually Sousuke comes but we'll see."
yeAh

Ina smiled.

"It would be fine if it was just the two of us!" She commented in a low teasing voice.
Nitori began to exam the two...they're both too close for his liking...
"Really? Are you saying that because...?" He kissed your nose cutely

Ina giggled as Rin kissed her nose. She fought back by kissing his cheek.

"Who knows~" She said teasingly.
Nitori began to come a bit closer, hoping not to get caught by the moment. He was still curious about what was going on..but at this point, he felt himself become heavy.

Rin hugged you close and rested his head on your shoulder. 
"I guess I get to find out tomorrow?" He kissed your cheek again.

Ina hugged Rin tightly and tries to snuggle into his chest.

"I guess you will" She mumbled softly.

Nitori was getting annoyed..but he couldn't hear the conversation well enough.

He tried to approach the two without blowing his cover once more until a crack can be heard underneath his feet. The duck looked down and saw how he pressed his shoe against a stick. Normally he didn't yell, but there was a small bug attract to the stick...the bug turned out to be a scattle beetle.

The boy yelled in surprised which led the man blow his cover.

Ina began to hear a strange sound in the distances and pulled away from Rin for a moment.

"Did you hear something?"
"It's only my heart beating for you.I can't hear anything else but your sweet voice."
"N-No..Rin I-I heard something...I feel like were not alone." Ina said in a scared tone.
The duck was suprisely wasn't noticed. Perhaps now was his chance to run away before its too late. He quickly got out of his hiding spot and was about to run until...

"Stay behind me."

Rin crept to the bushes to see a silver mop of hair

"Oi! Stop creeping around and face me like a man!"

Nitori was caught. The boy yelped and slowly began to turn his head. However, his eyes widen when  he noticed the view before him. Rin was glaring down towards him with his beautiful ruby's eyes. Nitori didn't want to admit it, but ever since he first laid his eyes on Rin made the duck skip a heartbeat.

The boy stood from where he hid and faced him.

"I-I am!" He said shyly.
"Huh? N-Nitori? What are you doing here? Have you turned into a hentai?"

The poor duck flinched at the word hentai. Nitori will admit, he can be very perverted when he wants to, but he was just casually passing by and just saw Rin...with someone..

"N-No! I-It was like that Matsuoka-sempai! I-I just casually passing by b-because m-my house was flooded...s-so I have no where to go!" The duck mentioned while almost crying in tears.
"What? You have no where to go? Why not go to Momo's? He only lives with his cat."

Rin was right, he was suppose to go with Momotaru's house. However, the little duck decided to explain something different...

"W-Well he was suppose to! B-But he mentioned something about going out of town! S-So I have no where to go!"
Ina noticed Rin talking to someone. She sighed sadly and sat onto the fountain, waiting for the conversation to end.
Rin went over to you and kissed your cheek.
"The sound was this kid. His apartment flooded. He was freaking out about what to do." Rin waved over the baby duck. "Oi, Nitori! Come over here!"

Ina flintched when Rin kissed her check. She blushed lightly but was able to control her blush when Rin mentioned about a certain boy.

"Huh? Who is he?" She asked in a curious tone.

Nitori stepped out of the bush, feeling a bit embarressing. He began to approach the two and was able to finally get a clear expression on who the other figure was. Apparently the figure turned out to be a chubby, tanned skin girl with black hair. Her eyes were like the colors of a brownie but seem to have a gentle yet energetic vibe.

The duck leaned towards his formal captain and spoke softly.

"Who is she? Do you know her?"
"We used to go to school together. Ina this is Nitori Aichirou. Nitori this is my girlfriend Ina."

Ina waved at the shorter man.

"Hello! Nice to meet you!"

The duck felt himself froze and lots in time. Girlfriend? Rin...had a..girlfriend? The poor duck felt heart shatter into a millions of pieces. He though that Rin would be at leasy Gay or Bi...but he didn't expect him to be straight at all...not to mention when he was able to date anyone!

In a calm manner, the boy greeted the girl.

"L-Like wise..."

Rin scratched his head and looked around.
"Nitori, where are your bags? Don't you have your clothes or anything?" While waiting for his answer he kissed your wrist in front of the baby duck

Ina flintched when Rin kissed her wrist, she quickly pulled her hand away while blushing.

"R-Rin! W-Were in front of s-someone..." She said.

Nitori couldn't help but to stare at the two for a while. He heart felt heavier than before almost to the point where he just wanted to run away. Yet he couldn't. He felt himself shattering bit by bit, but didn't let his broken side show.

The duck quickly shook his head and tried to speak.

"T-They all w-washed up from the f-flooding..." He spoke.

Rin smirked at you then looked at his former kouhai. 
"So you're homeless? When are you going to know something? Do you...want to stay with Sousuke and I?"

Nitori shrugged his shoulders and sighed sadly.

"I'm not sure at this point...I've just been trying to find someone to--"

His words were interrupted when Rin mentions about him staying over. Nitori could stay over? At Rin's place? Hearing the idea made him light up like a flashbulb. He quickly nod his head with high hopes of standing tall.

"C-Can you?!" He asked.

Rin nodded at him. 
"Yea, I have an extra futon for you and we'll get you some clothes in the morning. For now you can wear some of mine."

Nitori's eyes lid up even more when Rin mentions he could have stayed over. Going to Rin's apartment could be a chance for him to have some time with the boy. However, the boy couldn't help but to feel his cheeks become a bit red about the mention of wearing Rin's clothing. Rin's clothes were always big on Nitori so he never fit on him...but in the currently situation that he's in, what other choice does Nitori even have?

The poor duck began to cling onto Rin and sob silently.

"T-Thank you so m-much, Matsuoka-senpai!"

Ina giggled softly at Nitori's sudden cling towards Rin. She won't lie, but she head lots of stories about Nitori from Rin and Sousuke; yet she never met him in real life.

The girl smiled at the two before looking up at Rin.

"Shopping huh? Looks like were going to have to post-pone our swimming day together then.." She mentions

Rin moved Nitori to hug his girlfriend. 
"Come with us. Nitori needs a lady touch."
 Rin moved closer and whispered in your ear. 
"I could use your touch as well." He kissed your cheek and smirked

Ina's face was pretty much on fire when he whispered the last few words onto her ear. She pulled away from Rin only to cover up her face.

"R-Rin!! N-Not when s-someones here!! I told you t-this..." Ina said while sighing.

"B-But y-yeah, I'll g-go too...."

Nitori felt Rin shoving him away. The poor duck frowned sadly when he saw him going towards the girl instead. The duck couldn't help but to roll his eyes...he was pretty much getting tired of the two's flirts at this point. Call him rude, but he felt super uncomfortable about the entire situations.

The boy sighed to himself while trying to speak up.

"S-So I hate to break up the conversation..but w-where should we go?"

Rin looked back over and smirked.
"I have to take her home. So let's go." 
Ein took your hand and signaled for Nitori to follow. Rin made sure you got into your building safely. 
"Wait for me out here, Nitori." Inside Rin pulled you in for a succulent goodnight kiss. He really didn't want his kouhai watching.
Ina smiled and intertwined her hands with Rin's and walks next to him.

Nitori sighed sadly and follows behind the lovers.

Once he and the couple arrived to Ina's apartment, the duck came to a halt and was told to stay behind.

Nitori could only nod as he waited outside.

Ina was curious about why Nitori had to stay outside but shrugged her shoulders and entered the apartment complex. Once the she and Rin were alone, the girl was about to say goodbye until Rin pulled her into a kiss.

Ina giggled softly and quickly returned the kiss. She smiled up at him once the two broke apart.

"Now would be better time." She said softly.

"Oh? You mean for this? Or this?" 
Rin kissed your wrist then your cheek. 
"I better get back to Nitori before he freaks out." He kissed your lips one last time then led Nitori to his home.

Ina giggled when Rin kept kissing her.

However, her smile turned into a sad frown when Rin had to go. She sighed and returned the kiss.

"Alright then..I'll see you later.."

Once Rin left, she gave out one last smiled before entering into her apartment.

Meanwhile, Nitori felt so alive when he was next to Rin, especially when he was able to finally be alone with him. He looked up to his senpai and smiled.

"Thank you so much for letting me stay at yours and yamazaki-senpai's house!" He said while walking next to Rin.

Sousuke smiled down at his beloved and gave her a quick peck on the forehead. However, from the look onto the women's eyes, he knew how worried Momo was for her child. He'll admit, the whale-shark man was worried for Shuichi as well, but hopefully.... /they/ won't do too much harm for him.

"I see you're still worried about Shuichi..." Sousuke said while giving out a gentle smile.

"Rest assure, he's going to be in good hands soon. For now...I must get ready myself . Think you'll be patient with me too? I know Shuichi already is for me, but I'd also like to hear from the women I love..."

I could feel my cheeks get hot. 
 
 "Alright. I trust you and I'm pretty sure we can find something to do while you get ready." 
 
 I squeezed his hip giving him a sweet smile.

Sousuke chuckled softly while pulling away from the girl one last time before he escorted himself onto the bedroom.

As he arrived in the bedroom, the whale-shark man quickly pulled out his phone and called two certain formal teammates.

/Oi, are you and Ai coming yet?/
Momo-kin completely forgot about his baby sitting. He was currently stripping out his clothes for a little private time with his beloved

No! Not now! Who could want him?! He looked at the phone and then his promise came back. 
 
"Ai-chan, we're going to have to postpone things. Ummm, I forgot I said  we would babysit my nephew for Yamazaki-senpai."

 The boy ran to his bedroom to grab some sweatpants a tank and a t-shirt.
